headline.main: MARIJUANA HAZARDS, ESPECIALLY FOR THE YOUNG

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: We at the American Lung Association wish to point out a serious error in the Nov. 9 Op-Ed piece by Steve Chapple (''A Myopic Approach to Marijuana''). We were dismayed by his statement that it is only a myth that smoking marijuana causes permanent damage to the reproductive organs and the brain.
